Generation VII.Sun: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It's famous for being a hard worker.
Generation VII.Moon: This Pokémon can control water bubbles. It practices diligently so it can learn to make big bubbles.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Popplio gets on top of its bouncy water balloons to jump higher. It's quite the acrobatic fighter!

Generation VIII.Sword: It creates special bouncy balloons to send at its opponents. When the balloons pop, the sheer force of their bursting is what deals damage. *
Generation VIII.Shield: If Popplio want to create big, powerful balloons, they must be persistent. It takes daily practice for these Pokémon to develop their skills. *

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon can control balloons made of water. It practices diligently so it can learn to make big balloons.
Generation IX.Violet: The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.

Generation VII.Sun: First partner Pokémon from Hala in Iki Town
Generation VII.Moon: First partner Pokémon from Hala in Iki Town
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: First partner Pokémon from Professor Kukui in Route 1
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: First partner Pokémon from Professor Kukui in Route 1

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Reward for finding at least 100 Alolan Diglett (if the player chose Sobble )

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Coastal Biome (after boosting biodiversity in the Coastal Biome)
